overview: Jerry Michaud co-founded Horizon in 2003 and is a managing member of the Company and its President. Jerry also serves as President and a member of the Board of Directors of Horizon Technology Finance Corporation (NASDAQ: HRZN), a public, externally-managed Business Development Company. His background includes positions as Senior Vice President of GATX Ventures, Inc. and Senior Vice President of Transamerica Business Creditâ€™s Technology Finance division. Earlier, Jerry served as a Vice President with Financing For Science International, Inc. Prior to that, Jerry founded and served as President, Venture Leasing and Capital. Jerry attended Northeastern University, Rutgers University and the University of Phoenix, and has completed executive courses at Harvard Business School.
